import React from 'react'; import Select from 'react-select' import {Form} from 'react-bootstrap'; import {Button} from 'react-bootstrap'; import './App.css'; import arrow_1 from './yw-arrow-1.svg'; import arrow_2 from './yw-arrow-2.svg'; import {DropdownButton} from 'react-bootstrap'; import {Dropdown} from 'react-bootstrap'; export const options = [ { value: '', label: '' }, { value: 'Polymer 1 Cost', label: 'Polymer 1 Cost' }, { value: 'Polymer 2 Cost', label: 'Polymer 2 Cost' }, { value: 'KWH Cost', label: 'KWH Cost' }, { value: 'KWH Value', label: 'KWH Value' }, { value: 'Fuel Cost', label: 'Fuel Cost' }, { value: 'Sludge Production Modifier', label: 'Sludge Production Modifier' }, { value: 'Sludge Throughput Modifier', label: 'Sludge Throughput Modifier' } ] export const param_selector = (
CSV PDF
)
